parts.text:
Cyoda is an enterprise platform for building and running entity-driven, event‑driven applications. It provides:
- Entity modeling and schemas (CRUD, transactions, snapshots).
- Workflow/state‑machine support and configurable processors.
- Event pipelines and integrations (APIs, SQL/Trino, processing).
- Cloud services for entitlement, provisioning and multi‑tenant deployments.
- A documentation‑first API and schema reference for automation and integrations.

Quick docs:
- Intro / getting started: https://docs.cyoda.net/getting-started/introduction/
- Architecture overview: https://docs.cyoda.net/architecture/cyoda-cloud-architecture/
- API reference: https://docs.cyoda.net/api-reference/
- Guides (workflows, auth, data APIs): https://docs.cyoda.net/guides/

Would you like to:
[options-single-choice: Read the Introduction, View the API Reference]
